title: Crate Potion
summaries: The Crate Potion is a buff potion which grants the Crate buff when consumed. The buff increases the chance of getting a crate from 1/10 (10%) to (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/4 (25%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/5 (20%) when fishing. This lasts for (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 4 minutes / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 3 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]). The potion can be obtained both from crafting and as a quest reward from the Angler.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases chance to get a crate
statistics.Sell: 2 SC
